attributes.action: Allow constituents a vote of no confidence and removal from office of MP
attributes.additional_details: My local MP has consistently voted NO in Parliament for Bills which would have a direct impact on our local area and his constituents. He does not run surgeries, digital or otherwise. He does not reply to messages of criticism or questions regarding his voting history. He is not there for HIS people! He is not carrying out his basic duty of serving His Constituency
attributes.background: Allow constituents who believe their MP isn’t acting in their best interests to have their voice heard. Remove the MP from office and allow a vote to replace them. If their is clear evidence to prove this and other routes have been taken to voice dissatisfaction from a majority.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548400
